gw.api.note

Class NewNoteUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.note.NewNoteUtil

  • public class NewNoteUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for the new claim wizard's new note worksheet. It helps creating notes from template and links documents to the note. User: rwong

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.lang.String DOC_LINK_PREFIX
      Prefix used for encoded document links in note body
      protected static java.lang.String DOC_LINK_SUFFIX
      Suffix used for encoded document links in note body
